org.contentmine.graphics.svg.util

Class NamePattern

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.contentmine.graphics.svg.util.NamePattern

  • public class NamePattern
extends java.lang.Object
    manages named capture groups as Java can't see https://stackoverflow.com/questions/15588903/get-group-names-in-java-regex for some background. All workarounds are dodgy. Here we assume groups are all matched and all in order
    Author:
    pm286
